mapper.sql: id, planTitle, beginTime, endTime, isFinish, createTime, status
mapper.insert: insert into ${tableName} (id, planTitle, beginTime, endTime, isFinish, createTime, status) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{plantitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{begintime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{endtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{isfinish,jdbcType=BIT}, #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{status,jdbcType=BIT})

id,

mapper.update:
update ${tableName}
planTitle = #{plantitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
beginTime = #{begintime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
endTime = #{endtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
isFinish = #{isfinish,jdbcType=BIT},
createTime = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
status = #{status,jdbcType=BIT},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM information_schema.TABLES WHERE TABLE_NAME=#{tableName}
mapper.update: CREATE TABLE ${tableName} ( `id` varchar(50) NOT NULL, `planTitle` varchar(100) NOT NULL, `beginTime` datetime NOT NULL, `endTime` datetime NOT NULL, `isFinish` tinyint(1) NOT NULL, `createTime` datetime NOT NULL, `status` tinyint(1) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`) )
